user_story.i_want: to open the app and navigate between the main sections (Home, Catalog, Forecast, Profile)
user_story.so_that: I can access different features easily

acceptance_criteria.criterion: App launches to the "Home" screen by default.
A persistent Bottom Navigation Bar is visible on all main screens.
Nav Bar has 4 tabs: Home, Celestial Bodies, Forecast, Profile.
App uses "Deep Cosmos" (#020204) background color globally.
Navigation uses go_router with type-safe routes.

tasks.task: Clean up example code (Counter app, etc.).
Update pubspec.yaml with dependencies: flex_color_scheme, flutter_svg.
Configure FlexColorScheme to use #020204 as background.
Create HomeScreen, CatalogScreen, ForecastScreen, ProfileScreen placeholders.

doc.title: Technical Specification: Epic 1
doc.snippet: ShellRoute: Wraps all above routes with the Scaffold containing the BottomNavBar. / -> HomeRoute, /catalog -> CatalogRoute, etc.

doc.title: Architecture Document
doc.snippet: The project is initialized using the Erengun Riverpod Template. State Management: Riverpod 2.0. Navigation: GoRouter.

doc.title: Architecture Document
doc.snippet: All container widgets should use the shared GlassPanel widget. Ensures consistent "Deep Cosmos" aesthetic.

constraints.constraint: Must use Riverpod for state management.
Must implement Glassmorphism for the Nav Bar.

tests.standards: Use Widget Tests for the Navigation Shell. Verify that switching tabs changes the displayed widget without losing the Nav Bar.

ideas.test_idea: Tap "Forecast" tab, verify Forecast widget is found and Nav Bar is still present.
